tags.name: place-holder
tags.description:
`place-holder`

Events:

  * `place-holder-replace` - 

  * `place-holder-file-drop` - 

Attributes:

  * `iconFromType` {`string`} - calculate an icon based on the type that was used

  * `calcText` {`string`} - Calculate text based on the type in the event we have no default.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text place holder for describing this place holder element.

  * `type` {`string`} - A media type to visualize and also bubble events off of.

  * `drag-over` {`boolean`} - Bind dragging state to a variable so we can apply CSS.

  * `directions` {`string`} - 

Properties:

  * `iconFromType` {`string`} - calculate an icon based on the type that was used

  * `calcText` {`string`} - Calculate text based on the type in the event we have no default.

  * `text` {`string`} - Text place holder for describing this place holder element.

  * `type` {`string`} - A media type to visualize and also bubble events off of.

  * `dragOver` {`boolean`} - Bind dragging state to a variable so we can apply CSS.

  * `directions` {`string`} -

attributes.name: iconFromType
attributes.description:
`iconFromType` {`string`} - calculate an icon based on the type that was used

Property: iconFromType

attributes.name: calcText
attributes.description:
`calcText` {`string`} - Calculate text based on the type in the event we have no default.

Property: calcText

attributes.name: text
attributes.description:
`text` {`string`} - Text place holder for describing this place holder element.

Property: text

Default:

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
`type` {`string`} - A media type to visualize and also bubble events off of.

Property: type

Default: text

attributes.name: drag-over
attributes.description:
`drag-over` {`boolean`} - Bind dragging state to a variable so we can apply CSS.

Property: dragOver

Default: false

attributes.name: directions
attributes.description:
`directions` {`string`} - 

Property: directions

Default: Double click or drag and drop file to replace
